definitions.definition: The quality or state of being young.
definitions.example: Her youth and beauty attracted him to her.

definitions.definition: The part of life following childhood; the period of existence preceding maturity or age; the whole early part of life, from childhood, or, sometimes, from infancy, to adulthood.
definitions.example: I made many mistakes in my youth, but learned from them all.
There was a group of youths hanging around the parking lot, reading fashion magazines and listening to music.

definitions.definition: A young man; a male adolescent or young adult.
(used with a plural or singular verb) Young persons, collectively.
